title: inrum varavillaiyE ulaginil
sahitya:
inrum varavillaiyE ulaginil innalukk-ellai illaiyE jagadIshan


anupallavi

  anru muppuragaLai azhitta neTrik-kaNNan aruL purivAn enrE AshaiyAi nambinEn


caraNam 1    pAril arakkar sheyyum pOr mEgham paDarndadE panca mA bAdhakar vanja valai aDarndadE
kAr mEgham pOla shennIr mEgham pozhiyudE kAppATrum dharmamO gatigeTTingkalaiyudE
    caraNam 2    kAma krOdha lObhak-kaDu mOhap-pEikkulam kaTTinri vAzhvinai veTTi veTTi sAikkudE
bhUmiyaik-kAttiDum sAmi engE enrE  puNNiyar paritApak-kaNNIr viDuginrAr
